participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and dedicated, she is passionate about her goal of becoming a lawyer. Emily is also down-to-earth and has a nurturing side, stemming from her upbringing on a horse farm.
participant_1.background: i'm from a small town. i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Fashion-forward and somewhat rebellious, he enjoys the finer things in life but feels misunderstood by his family. Jordan has a keen sense of style and is driven by his passion for luxury items.
participant_2.background: i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer. i often shop for shoes and watches. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. my family does not support my career choices.
